subject: Basketball
Height (Stature)
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: Giannis Antetokounmpo and Mason Plumlee may have a disadvantage because in the past 30 years, only two players at least 6-foot-10 have won the annual N.B.A. competition.
snippet: Giannis Antetokounmpo and Mason Plumlee may have a disadvantage because in the past 30 years, only two players at least 6-foot-10 have won the annual N.B.A. competition.
